name: Metropoly
blurb: A life simulation game where you can live the life you've always wanted and play your way to success.

rewards.reward: No Reward
APPRECIATION - We'll send you our gratitude and happy thoughts.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - You'll get early access to Metropoly's beta, PLUS a special founders achievement badge, PLUS we'll put your name on the Founder's Hall of Fame.
RANDOM CLOTHING ITEM - \r\n\r\nDon't run around naked! We'll start you off in the game with a pair jeans, shorts, a bikini, or something else to wear.
HYPOCHONDRIAC'S PACKAGE - \r\n\r\nWe'll start you off with a full medicine cabinet to cure you from almost any harm.
TECHNOLOGY LOVER-\r\n\r\nDon't come to town empty handed! We'll start you off with either a laptop, cell phone, music player or metal detector.
THE FASHIONISTA PACKAGE - We'll start you off with full evening attire and some matching jewelry. You'll be the talk of town.
METROPOLY CASH - \r\n\r\nBeing broke sucks! We'll start you off with 3000 Metro coins, worth $50.

METROPOLY T-SHIRT - Get your very own Metropoly t-shirt. (Outside the US, please add aditional $10). And of course this is in addition to your early access rights, and you get to choose between the following packages - Technology Lover/Fashionista/Cash.
CHARACTER BOOST - We have six items hidden in the game, each of them giving a boost to one characteristic. Get a random one to become undefeated!

CREATE YOUR OWN GOD ACTION - Finding a fly in the soup, stepping on dog poop, or finding money on the street. We'll turn your idea into a game reality! You'll also be noted as a Metropoly Game Creator in the Hall of Fame.\r\n\r\n___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)

METROPOLY REAL ESTATE - CLAIM FIT FOR ONE BUILDING. We'll are selling small and limited sections of Metropoly land near the city center, these are the lands we will use first to build additional parts of the city. Owning such a claim will make you the property owner!! When in the future you or any other people would like to use your land to build on it, you'll be able to charge rent and in the future to manage it, cash on it and do much much more...

NAME A DRINK AFTER YOU - Metropoly's bar is already serving Shirley Temples and Cosmopolitans. Now it can have your very own drink! 


___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)

NAME A DISH AFTER YOU - One of Metropoly's restaurants will immortalize you with one of its dishes.


___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)

METROPOLY REAL ESTATE - CLAIM FIT FOR TWO BUILDINGS. We'll are selling small and limited sections of Metropoly land near the city center, these are the lands we will use first to build additional parts of the city. Owning such a claim will make you the property owner!! When in the future you or any other people would like to use your land to build on it, you'll be able to charge rent and in the future to manage it, cash on it and do much much more...

METROPOLY REAL ESTATE - CLAIM FIT FOR THREE BUILDINGS. We'll are selling small and limited sections of Metropoly land near the city center, these are the lands we will use first to build additional parts of the city. Owning such a claim will make you the property owner!! When in the future you or any other people would like to use your land to build on it, you'll be able to charge rent and in the future to manage it, cash on it and do much much more...

NAME A STREET - We'll name a Metropoly street after you or a name of your choice. All the residents of Metropoly will be living or hanging out on YOUR boulevard.


___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)

NAME A TOWN SQUARE - We'll name one of our two town squares after you, or in memory of someone of your choice.


 ___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)

NAME A PLACE AFTER YOU - You'll get immortalized in one of the ten most popular places in Metropoly, such as the diner, a movie theater, or a bar.


___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)

BUILD YOUR OWN PLACE - If you own a business or a brand that fits into one of our building structures (store, bar, restaurant, movie theater, etc.), we'll build a building with your own brand and your special action items.
You'll also be noted as a Metropoly Game Creator in the Hall of Fame.


___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)

BUILD A BRAND NEW BUILDING - We will custom design a brand new building for your business or brand that will fit your product and its functionality.
You'll also be noted as a Metropoly Game Creator in the Hall of Fame.


___ (PLUS you get the Early Birds Special and your choice of one of the following awards - Clothing, Hypochondriac, Technology, Fashionista, Cash or Character boost.)
